name: Pixelsphere - A Musical Adventure
blurb: A classic pixel art platformer and generative music experience where the soundtrack changes with how you play the game. (Mac/Win)

rewards.reward: No Reward
(DIGITAL) Thank you! Access to a behind the scenes site with development details, and an exclusive Pixelsphere wallpaper.
(DIGITAL) DRM-free copy of Pixelsphere, Mac and Windows.
(DIGITAL) Pixelsphere Mac/Win + Soundtrack (Digital MP3 download). Trust me, you are going to want the soundtrack :)

(DIGITAL)  Pixelsphere Mac/Win + Deluxe Soundtrack (MP3 + FLAC + WAV) + GENERATIVE MUSIC COLLECTION - Several hours of my favorite procedurally generated compositions taken directly from the game + COMPLETE MUSIC COLLECTION. All of the music created during Pixelsphere will be made available to you. There are outtakes, extended versions, half-tempo versions, sparse versions and other variations that didn't make the final cut but are interesting in their own right. This gives you an exciting insight into my musical development process and plenty of listening material! + DIGITAL ARTWORK COLLECTION. My personal favorite hi-res level art screencaps taken in more detail than can be seen in game (PDF/PNG).

(DIGITAL) All previous rewards + Early beta access starting MARCH 2014. Help test and provide feedback on the game. You will be able to play through the entire game before the story and art are complete.
(PHYSICAL) All previous rewards + one signed 4x6 print of level art from the game.

(PHYSICAL) All previous rewards + Five albums from The Cynic Project (digital mp3 download) + Early access to beta versions of the game starting JANUARY 2014. Your name will be mentioned in the credits inside the game.
(PHYSICAL) Postcard! A collection of six 6x4 prints of art from Pixelsphere, as well as all previous rewards.
(PHYSICAL) 8x8 Pixelsphere Art Book + All previous rewards.
(PHYSICAL) 8x8 SIGNED Pixelsphere Art Book + All previous DIGITAL rewards (i.e. only includes ONE art book). + MID-TIER backer credits. Book is autographed and hand-numbered.

(DESIGNER) NEW REWARD!!! Submit your ideas, photographs, drawings and I will turn them into a layout and colors for a Pixelsphere level. It could be anything like a childhood art project, your favorite picture(s) of a sunset or a collection of nature photographs that you captured. Yes, it can have your name embedded in the level. I may also incorporate your ideas for level challenges, obstacles and goals if you have a good idea for a level! Also includes all previous DIGITAL rewards. (does not include any physical rewards)
(PHYSICAL) 8x8 signed Pixelsphere Art Book + a Pixelsphere POSTER featuring the cover art and selected level art in stunning HD detail. (11x14 print). Also includes all previous DIGITAL rewards.
(PHYSICAL) Premium hard cover 12x12 art book featuring concept art & screencaps from the game + all other previous DIGITAL rewards  (i.e. does not include the 8x8 art book and poster)

(PHYSICAL) 12x12 art book from the previous tier  + TOP TIER backer credits. Your name will appear at the top of the backer credits. + ALL previous DIGITAL rewards (i.e. does NOT include poster or 8x8 art book)

(DESIGNER + PHYSICAL) Design a baddy. We'll work together to design a creature that will appear as pixel art in the game. Preferably it is an insect or small creature that fits the style of Pixelsphere. Also includes the 8x8 art book.

(DESIGNER + PHYSICAL) Design a level + ALL previous DIGITAL rewards . Submit your ideas, photographs, drawings and I will turn them into a layout and colors for a level. It could be anything like a childhood art project, your favorite picture(s) of a sunset or a collection of nature photographs that you captured. Yes, it can have your name embedded in the level. Also includes the 8x8 art book.

(DESIGNER + PHYSICAL) CANVAS ART PRINT. A 16x16 canvas wall-art print of selected Pixelsphere level art. Provide your favorite colors or images as inspiration for the product (optional) All previous DIGITAL rewards (i.e. does not include any other physical rewards)

(DESIGNER) Design a secret for the game. This could be a secret level, musical theme, puzzle or all three. It can be something that only you know about, well... until you tell your friends :) Includes all previous digital rewards and the 12x12 art book.

(EXECUTIVE PRODUCER) We'll work together to make something really cool for the game. It could be a gameplay mechanic, special level, or whatever within the obvious bounds and scope of this game. You will be credited as executive producer for the game as a result of our collaboration. Includes all previous digital rewards and the 12x12 art book.
